footer.title: Manage your workshop, vehicles, and customers — all in one place.

login_page.title: Welcome back to Garageek
login_page.description: Your intelligent garage partner is just a click away. Unlock a seamless experience in service tracking, customer engagement, and garage management.
login_page.dont_have_account: Don't you have an licence? Click here.

two_factor_auth_page.title: Two Factor Authentication
two_factor_auth_page.description: Enter your six digit otp from authenticator application and verify it.

forgot_password_page.title: Forgot Password?
forgot_password_page.description: Enter your registered licence and email address below, and we’ll send you instructions to reset your password.

registration_page.title: Welcome to Garageek
registration_page.description: Your intelligent garage partner is just a click away. Unlock a seamless experience in service tracking, customer engagement, and garage management.
registration_page.checkBox_1: I confirm that the information provided is valid and matches the details on my official ID documents.
registration_page.already_have_account: All ready have licence? Login here.
